title: Ultra High Performance Fibre Reinforced Concretes (UHPFRC) for rehabilitation of bridges - recent advances in Slovenia

author: Aljoša Šajna, Zavod za gradbeništvo Slovenije

segmentation: I will now call on Doctor Alicia Shiner to give us the third presentation.
Titled, Ultra High Performance Fiber reinforced concrete for rehabilitation of bridges.
Recent advances in Slovenia.
Doctor Lusher, Shiner studied civil engineering at the Faculty of Civil and Eutectic Engineering at the University of Ljubljana in Slovenia.
His research work at the Vienna University of Technology in the field of fracture mechanics of mass concrete was completed with a PhD thesis.
He returned to Slovenia and worked in the field of concrete and concrete technology as head of laboratory and consultant engineer.

At present he is at the Slovenian National Building and Civil Engineering Institute Zag, where he is responsible for research work in the field of concrete, concrete, technology and execution of concrete works daughter Charlotte.
